txt.en: 'A man who ventured out into the Whitshaws of late reported that the plains are no longer safe, for goblins riding on Wargs have taken to circling the snows south-east of Dunfast.\n\n'Will you go and take them down? Goblins tend to be slightly weaker than Orcs, so I hope that it will not be difficult for you to take down several of them.'
Goblins riding on Wargs have been seen swarming the plains of the Whitshaws of late, circling the snows south-east of Dunfast.
'Are you ready to ride to the Whitshaws? The goblins await your vengeance!'\n\n<rgb=#FF0000>This is an instanced public questing area.</rgb>

'I heard rumours already of your vengeance against those vile goblins in the Whitshaws! Their battle-cries could be heard from afar, and your victory was swift and sure.\n\n'You have done well, [placeholder]!'
<rgb=#FF0000>Completing Wildermore's Recovery will cancel this quest.</rgb>
Defeat mounted goblins on the Whitshaws plains ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The plains south-east of Dunfast can be reached by speaking with Dudoc to travel there.\n\nYou should travel to the plains of the Whitshaws and defeat a number of goblin-riders there.
Dudoc is in Forlaw.\n\nYou should return to Dudoc.
